item.title: Large deep pothole outside 61 court road, 19th January
item.description:
Large pothole about 30cm wide and 20 long, deeper than a golf ball on site of previous repair
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Court Road, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle Lane full of debris, rubbish and leaves, 19th January
item.description:
As you leave Cheltenham going up the hill to Seven Springs the bike path (which was created when the road was repaired at a cost of ££££) is unusable due to the fact that it is never cleaned or road swept. Riding this way to work every week is impossible, forcing me into busy 60mph carriageway. A deep clean is needed then a routine needs to be created to keep it useable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This picture taken less than a week after my previous report and the supposed repair you informed me about.Please also see my response on the GCC SATISFACTION LINK, 19th January
